body.name: Evenflo Pivot Xpand Second Seat (Ayrshire Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 35 mins
features: SWITCH IT UP: Toddler seat transitions to lay-flat carriage mode, allowing baby to stretch out, while the adjustable canopy offers three heights to fit kids up to 43 in.
TRANSITION FROM SINGLE TO DOUBLE: A second seat allows you to accommodate an additional child without the need for another stroller
EASILY ADAPT FOR A GROWING FAMILY: Toddler seat is the same, full-size as the seat that comes with the stroller or travel system and it holds a child up to 55 lb
LARGE CANOPY: Protection from the elements with an adjustable canopy that offers three heights to fit kids up to 43 in., with a peek-a-boo window that keeps baby visible at all times.
ADJUSTABLE FOOTREST: 6 footrest positions for child’s comfort
ACCESSORIZE IT: Toddler seat is compatible with the Evenflo Stroller Child Snack Tray with Snack Cup (sold separately)
body.description: The Evenflo® Pivot Xpand™ Stroller Second Seat is the perfect addition for your growing family! The seat easily and quickly attaches with no tools or adapters. On your stroller, simply slide the main seat attachment up to create extra space and flip out the front seat attachment to click your second seat into place. Two children can now ride at once. For babies, the second seat effortlessly transforms to carriage mode, so your baby can lie flat and stretch out. The seat easily clicks onto the attachments in both parent- and forward-facing modes, giving you multiple riding conﬁgurations. The canopy can be adjusted to one of three heights as your child grows. The canopy shields your precious cargo from sun, wind and rain, while the peek-a-boo window allows you to keep an eye on your baby at all times. And the canopy can be adjusted to one of 3 heights to accommodate your growing child. As your family grows, so can your stroller! The seat can recline into 3 different positions with an easy one-handed tilt, while the footrest can be adjusted to any one of 6 positions. The toddler seat fits children up to 55 lb and 43 in. The seat comes with a 5-point harness and a detachable bumper bar, making it a breeze to get your child in and out of the seat. Compatible with the Evenflo Stroller Child Snack Tray with Snack Cup (sold separately). Compatible with the Pivot Xpand Travel System and Pivot Xpand Standalone Stroller. It’s been 100 years and Evenflo continues to push the boundaries in baby and children’s gear design and innovation. We meet the needs of new generations of parents by focusing on what they really care about: leading-edge safety, smart design and technology, and convenient features that help them enjoy the journey of parenthood.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: Clean minor spills and stains on cloth, vinyl or plastic surfaces with cold water and mild soap. Air dry. On models with removable seat pads, machine wash them separately in cold water–delicate cycle. NO chlorine bleach. Tumble dry 10 – 15 minutes on low heat, remove immediately. DO NOT iron or dry clean. Metal and plastic parts can be wiped clean with a soft damp cloth and dried with a soft cloth. DO NOT use abrasive cleaners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great stroller, easy to handle, color great, all around exactly as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought the extra seat for my treadmill since my 4 year old is still very petite in size and hates walking much. Fit great on my xpandable evenflo stroller and the canopy gave extra shade in length than the original one does. Worked great at Disneyland

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for 3 Year Old! She's now 6 and still fits!!
reviews.reviewText: My family absolutely loves this EvenFlo Pivot Xpand modular stroller! We actually pre-ordered the stroller combo with the infant car seat and base and the additional travel seat. The combo worked great because our newborn used the infant seat and our 3 year old used the travel seat. We knew in a couple of years we would need to purchase an additional travel seat because at a certain age infants begin to HATE their infant seats. And thats why we made this purchase! By the way, our 3 year old is turning 6 in a couple months and she still FITS!! She is skinny and has an average growth chart.This modular stroller system is THE best system out there! EvenFlo is careful to warn that, the seats should not carry more than 50lbs each. We have had this stroller system for nearly 3 years now and we are happy to say that this stroller is a work horse! Even despite those warnings (probably only to reduce liability), we pull our weekly grocery run in our stroller, transport potted plants, stack up on the weekend BBQ supplies, heavy coolers, and much more! The ability to pick and choose how you want to set up the seats is definitely one of the best features of this system. We've recommended this system to all of our friends...Pros:- Highly adjustable- Leg portion has three adjustable settings- Comes with matching shaded canopy with a flap for cooling- Seat can be mounted front or back on the stroller- Seat can be mounted on the top or bottom post on the stroller- Reclines in three positions- Can be used as seat or bassinet- Adjustable Seat restraints- Foot area has rubberized material making it easy to wipe clean.Cons:- Material cannot be removed for machine washing- Must hand wash and spot clean- Black bar serves no significant purpose- Black bar should've been designed as a small table or cup holder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars purchased for a gift
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted this carriage for her future baby that’s due March 2024, because she already has a baby and they will be 15 months apart. However she’s using it early and we absolutely love this courage definitely would buy or suggest as a gift again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy and I'm happy with it
reviews.reviewText: We love this stroller. We have a young daughter and a new born on the way. Its light and pretty scaled down. It doesnt come with a whole bunch of accessories but it works and it's just as advertised in the videos. We bought an extra car seat for it as an add on and it can be used multiple ways. Had it for a few months now so this review is after a lot of use. Definitely durable and use it almost daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great add on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our favorite stroller just got better!
reviews.reviewText: Adding this second seat was the icing on the cake! I love that I don’t have to restrict the kids from which seat to sit in since the seats are identical in appearance and weight limit! I love being able to take out walking with everyone able to see the work or mama or each other and upon tiring themselves out that they can both get a nap! Seriously! Getting my 3 year old to nap is nearly impossible but she will sleep an hour or more in this stroller! I was actually really glad that the original package only came with one toddler seat because I didn’t know if we’d need the second one but here we are, after using the car seat as a travel system double stroller for a full year my now 13 and 37 month olds are both still asking for a daily stroller ride in their evenflo xpand NOW with two toddler seats!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, snaps into place, comfortable for kids.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this second seat to go with our newly purchased Evenflo Pivot Xpand for our new baby coming. I love that there’s an option to buy the second seat, so when baby grows out of the infant car seat, you can snap this one in its place and have a functioning double stroller. My oldest two boys tested this out when we went on a walk the other day. They loved being in it, and they actually complained when we had to put it away. My only recommendation is if Evenflo would make the seat height a little further up for more headroom for older toddlers.
Muy bien producto, nos ha ayudado bastante con mi bebé de 2 años y la de 3 meses, carriola muy fácil de armar y sin necesidad de comprar adaptadores especiales para convertirla en doble :)
